name: Church Community Builder
overview: Church management software is most effective when your entire community can participate. The enterprise-level, web-based church software solution saves time and money by unifying core church needs and information into one right place. They provide fully integrated social tools to help your people connect, communicate and build community. Whether you are a new church plant, a multi-site ministry or a mega church, the result is a greater sense of belonging for your people and a robust picture of the overall involvement of your congregation.
